<!-- Do not edit this file. It is automatically generated by API Documenter. -->

[`Keymap`](Keymap.md)

## Keymap class

Manages keymap lifecycle for different [Scope](Scope.md)<!-- -->s.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export class Keymap 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [`isModEvent(evt)`](Keymap.isModEvent.md) | <code>static</code> | Translates an event into the type of pane that should open. Returns 'tab' if the modifier key Cmd/Ctrl is pressed OR if this is a middle-click MouseEvent. Returns 'split' if Cmd/Ctrl+Alt is pressed. Returns 'window' if Cmd/Ctrl+Alt+Shift is pressed. |
|  [`isModifier(evt, modifier)`](Keymap.isModifier.md) | <code>static</code> | Checks whether the modifier key is pressed during this event. |
|  [`popScope(scope)`](Keymap.popScope.md) |  | Remove a scope from the scope stack. If the given scope is active, the next scope in the stack will be made active. |
|  [`pushScope(scope)`](Keymap.pushScope.md) |  | Push a scope onto the scope stack, setting it as the active scope to handle all key events. |
